thinking_about_it.question: What's holding you back? Sometimes it just helps to run the numbers — no pressure, no commitment.
thinking_about_it.logic: Low-pressure redirect to value. Opens the real objection without confrontation.

get_back_to_you.question: Of course, take your time. Just curious — are you thinking spring market, or more of a 'when the timing is right' situation?
get_back_to_you.logic: Keeps the door open. Surfaces timeline without pressure.

zestimate_reference.question: Zillow's algorithm doesn't know your kitchen was just renovated or that it overlooks a park. Want to see the real comps that actually matter?
zestimate_reference.logic: Undermine automated estimates, reposition Jorge's expertise.

has_realtor.question: Good to know! If your agent ever wants a second set of eyes on the comps, Jorge's happy to compare. More data always helps.
has_realtor.logic: Respectful of existing relationship. Opens collaboration angle.

market_shift.question: If you're serious about selling, you should know market conditions are shifting right now. Would 15 minutes to look at real numbers make sense?
